about-me-desc: Hey there! I'm Ruben, a frontend developer fueled by a passion for crafting user-friendly digital experiences. With a talent for problem-solving and an eye for detail, I specialize in translating complex ideas into elegant designs.
about-me-desc-first: Let's connect and create something amazing together!
about-me-desc-second: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Siegen and remotely.
about-me-desc-third: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
about-me-desc-fourth: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.
skills-desc: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to Continously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
skills-other-desc: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
skills-mobile: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.
portfolio-desc: Explore a selection of my work here -
portfolio-desc-second: Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

pollo.name: El Pollo Loco
pollo.desc: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

join.name: Join
join.desc: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
